I have a real problem with this language coming from the Ontario LTC commission, that LTC was "forgotten" in pandemic prep.   By saying "forgotten" they hide culpability. Who forgot about it? The owners of these facilities couldn't have. The LTC *Minister* couldn't have. Who?

I have a real problem with this language coming from the Ontario LTC commission, that LTC was "forgotten" in pandemic prep.   By saying "forgotten" they hide culpability. Who forgot about it? The owners of these facilities couldn't have. The LTC *Minister* couldn't have. Who?

The commission says “LTC homes were forgotten in the initial provincial plans to control spread of COVID-19 until residents started dying”   Nearly 2,000 seniors are dead. Residents still aren’t safe.   Ford must do the right thing, starting with asking Fullerton to resign. 1/2

If I were premier, I’d hire thousands of PSWs, make their jobs full time & pay them better. I’d put infection control specialists in every LTC home. I’d prioritize seniors’ wellbeing & safety, instead of penny-pinching.   Because Ford’s strategy will cost us so much more. 2/2

I listened for 20 minutes to Premier Ford's angst, talking about staying up late listening to business concerns and mayor pressures. Not a single mention of mounting DEATHS, hospitalizations, and LTC outbreaks. I now have zero confidence in the Premier's covid agenda. #unbalanced
